disconnection.title: O ne!
disconnection.message: Atrodo kad praradome ryšį su distancinio valdymo pultu. Prašau patikrinkite ar jis matomas tinkle.

pagesTab.title: Puslapiai
pagesTab.message: Galite pridėti grupę prie puslapio užtempę ant profilio bei pasirinkę.

groupsTab.title: Grupės
groupsTab.message: Galite pridėti objektą prie grupės užtempę ant puslapio distancionio ręžime kairėje.

entitiesTab.title: Objektai
entitiesTab.message: Drag entities to the remote view to add them to favorites or a group.

remote.defaultMessage: Select a page in a profile to start editing

softwareUpdate.title: Software Update
softwareUpdate.description: Automatically look for updates and update when a new software version is available. Updates are installed at 04.00 am.
softwareUpdate.upToDate: Your software is up to date

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.message: Manually set the remote config by hand:

autoBrightness.title: Auto Brightness
autoBrightness.description: Automatically adjust the brightness based on ambient light.
